content.text:
# Draft:Mass Culture

[https://www.massculture.com/ Mass Culture] is a growth marketing agency. Founded in 2022 as a sister company to [https://www.brains.co/ Brains], Mass Culture designs and executes paid media strategies focused on brand awareness, new customer acquistion, and lifetime value. The agency's senior leadership has extensive experience in Paid Media, Brand Marketing, data science, analytics, forecasting, and predictive modeling.
References
https://www.massculture.com/
https://www.brains.co/
https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/creative-agency-brains-on-fire-inc-announces-creation-of-sister-digital-growth-company-mass-culture-inc-301619959.html
